verses.text: So \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* was \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And these \add were\add* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* which he had; \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*,\f + \fr 4.2 \ft priest: or, chief officer\f*

\w Elihoreph|strong="H0456"\w* and \w Ahiah|strong="H0281"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shisha|strong="H7894"\w*, \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w*; \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahilud|strong="H0286"\w*, the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft scribes: or, secretaries\f*\f + \fr 4.3 \ft recorder: or, remembrancer\f*

And \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \add was\add* over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \add were\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*:

And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \add was\add* over the \w officers|strong="H5324"\w*: and \w Zabud|strong="H2071"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \add was\add* principal \w officer|strong="H3548"\w*, \add and\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w friend|strong="H7463"\w*:

And \w Ahishar|strong="H0301"\w* \add was\add* over the \w household|strong="H1004"\w*: and \w Adoniram|strong="H0141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abda|strong="H5653"\w* \add was\add* over the \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft tribute: or, levy\f*

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w officers|strong="H5324"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which provided \w victuals|strong="H3557"\w* for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*: each \w man|strong="H0259"\w* his \w month|strong="H2320"\w* in a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* made \w provision|strong="H3557"\w*.
And these \add are\add* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*: The son of \w Hur|strong="H1133"\w*, in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*:\f + \fr 4.8 \ft The son…: or, Ben-hur\f*

The son of \w Dekar|strong="H1128"\w*, in \w Makaz|strong="H4739"\w*, and in \w Shaalbim|strong="H8169"\w*, and \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, and \w Elon-beth-hanan|strong="H0358"\w*:\f + \fr 4.9 \ft The son…: or, Ben-dekar\f*

The son of \w Hesed|strong="H1136"\w*, in \w Aruboth|strong="H0700"\w*; to him \add pertained\add* \w Sochoh|strong="H7755"\w*, and all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*:\f + \fr 4.10 \ft The son…: or, Ben-hesed\f*

The son of \w Abinadab|strong="H1125"\w*, in all the \w region|strong="H5299"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w*; which had \w Taphath|strong="H2955"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*:\f + \fr 4.11 \ft The son…: or, Ben-abinadab\f*

\w Baana|strong="H1195"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahilud|strong="H0286"\w*; \add to him pertained\add* \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* and \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, and all \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w*, which \add is\add* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w Zartanah|strong="H6891"\w* beneath \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, from \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* to \w Abel-meholah|strong="H0065"\w*, \add even\add* unto \add the place that is\add* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jokneam|strong="H3361"\w*:

The son of \w Geber|strong="H1127"\w*, in \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H1568"\w*; to him \add pertained\add* the \w towns|strong="H2333"\w* of \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, which \add are\add* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*; to him \add also pertained\add* the \w region|strong="H2256"\w* of \w Argob|strong="H0709"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* and \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*:\f + \fr 4.13 \ft The son…: or, Ben-geber\f*
\w Ahinadab|strong="H0292"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* \add had\add* \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*:\f + \fr 4.14 \ft Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim\f*

\w Ahimaaz|strong="H0290"\w* \add was\add* in \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*; he also \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Basmath|strong="H1315"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*:
\w Baanah|strong="H1195"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \add was\add* in \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* and in \w Aloth|strong="H1175"\w*:
\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Paruah|strong="H6515"\w*, in \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*:
\w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0414"\w*, in \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*:

\w Geber|strong="H1398"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w* \add was\add* in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \add in\add* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*; and \add he was\add* the \w only|strong="H0259"\w* \w officer|strong="H5333"\w* which \add was\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* which \add is\add* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* in \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, and making \w merry|strong="H8056"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4910"\w* over all \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: they \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w provision|strong="H3899"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* was \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*,\f + \fr 4.22 \ft provision: Heb. bread\f*\f + \fr 4.22 \ft measures: Heb. cors\f*

\w Ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* out of the \w pastures|strong="H7471"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, beside \w harts|strong="H0354"\w*, and \w roebucks|strong="H6643"\w*, and \w fallowdeer|strong="H3180"\w*, and \w fatted|strong="H0075"\w* \w fowl|strong="H1257"\w*.

For he had \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* over all \add the region\add* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, from \w Tiphsah|strong="H8607"\w* even to \w Azzah|strong="H5804"\w*, over all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*: and he had \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* on all \w sides|strong="H5650"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* under his \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* and under his fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* even to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.\f + \fr 4.25 \ft safely: Heb. confidently\f*

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w stalls|strong="H0723"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* for his \w chariots|strong="H4817"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And those \w officers|strong="H5324"\w* provided \w victual|strong="H3557"\w* for \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and for all that \w came|strong="H7131"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: they \w lacked|strong="H5737"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Barley|strong="H8184"\w* also and \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* for the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w dromedaries|strong="H7409"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* they unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \add the officers\add* were, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w charge|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 4.28 \ft dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts\f*

¶ And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w*, and \w largeness|strong="H7341"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, even as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* that \add is\add* on the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H8193"\w*.

And \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w excelled|strong="H7235"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the east \w country|strong="H6924"\w*, and all the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

For he was \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w* than all \w men|strong="H0120"\w*; than \w Ethan|strong="H0387"\w* the \w Ezrahite|strong="H0250"\w*, and \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, and \w Chalcol|strong="H3633"\w*, and \w Darda|strong="H1862"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahol|strong="H4235"\w*: and his \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* was in all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w proverbs|strong="H4912"\w*: and his \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* were a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* of \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, from the cedar \w tree|strong="H0730"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* even unto the \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w* that springeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* also of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and of \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w*, and of creeping \w things|strong="H7431"\w*, and of \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w*.

And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* of all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, from all \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, which had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
